results.content:
Nice content, powerful logics, clean codes and good lecturing.

I was expecting cloud functions too but so far, it is going great.

note: Not the entire world has a reliable internet connection, we need to download content to watch later and you are not making that possible???

results.content: I am about done with this class, about 2 more lectures to go. To be honest, initially I had some difficulty, but early into the courses those difficulties smoothed out. In my opinion this is by far one of the best courses on Ionic, Angular, and Firebase, I have taken both on Udemy and Youtube.  He describes concisely what he is doing and why. Thank you. Great course.

response.content: Thanks Robert for the feedback :) Much appreciated :) Regards, RapidDevPro

results.content:
Fantastic course. Very knowledgeable instructor. Very easy to follow. Fully explains the code he is writing. One of the best courses I have done on udemy.

edit. half way through the course now and i have to add that anyone wanting to add firebase authentication to their ionic/angular app absolutely must get this course.

response.content: Thanks, Jonjo for the feedback :) Glad to hear that, Much appreciated :) Thanks & Regards, RapidDevPro

results.content: Good course overall - lots of topics covered and very informative. However due to several issues with my platform (Ubuntu 20.04 and Android Studio), I wasn't able to actually complete the product manager app past a certain point. But I definitely learned a lot and have a better understanding of Ionic now.
